name: phonebook
description: Separate repository for part 3 of fullstackcourse

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../fullstackcourse/part2/phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../../../fullstackcourse-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
